entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-05
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Setting route order imperatively #47579
  • Heartbeat.TimerLoop continues running after WebHost stopped and disposed #47577
  • Support using Blazor to build .NET tools #47576
    Backlog
  • Append Hashes To Blazor Published Files #47575
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Authentication.WebAssembly.Msal: Trigger AuthenticationStateChanged event when initialized from browser cache #47574
  • Object reference error from DefaultHttpRequest.set_RouteValues #47573
  • Use FrozenDictionary where appropriate #47569

Closed

  • MinimalAPI - RequestDelegateFactory - IOException Generates Http StatusCode 200 (on FormReading) #47578
  • Identity database scaffolding #46970
  • CanHaveBody should be false for HTTP/2 CONNECT #46002
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Add user defined request header variable (variables), as a parameter to the LoadAssembliesAsync in blazor #47570
    Discussions
  • Run ASP.Net Core on Mobile OSs like Ionic capacitor #47565
  • Love the new highlight syntax when doing routing #47572
  • Ability to opt into streaming SSR on a per-subtree basis #46993
    8.0-preview4
  • [Minimal API] IFormFile does not bind when using WithOpenApi extension method #47526

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Heartbeat logging after disposal #47580
    area-runtime
  • Obsolete concurrency limiter middleware. #47571
    breaking-change, area-runtime, needs-breaking-change-announcement

Merged

  • Signify bodylessness for HTTP/2 extended CONNECTs #47550
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Control streaming SSR per subtree #47555
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-united, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime, blog-candidate
  • Add metrics to ASP.NET Core #46834
    area-runtime
  • Add MapIdentity<TUser>() #47414
    area-identity
  • Added enableRangeProcessing parameter to TypedResult.Stream(...) #47558
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Add generic variants of MVC attributes #47075
    pending-ci-rerun
  • [release/7.0] Web.ProjectTemplates: exclude 'Program.cs' from all templates that replace it. #47114
    area-mvc, pending-ci-rerun, 7.0.x
  • Enable AOT template tests #47247
    area-mvc, area-web-frameworks
  • change 'ValuesController' to 'ValueController' #47474
    area-mvc, pr: pending author input
  • Extend ControllerBase.Problem that can add extensions to ProblemDetails #47539
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Update SDK #47540
    area-signalr
  • Set exception handler feature in developer exception page #47554
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Try skipping tests with Japanese chars #47560
    area-infrastructure, area-signalr, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Improve pfx support for CertificateConfigLoader #43719
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
